title: Windows Media Player - library format
content:
Is anyone aware of any documentation (official or reverse-engineered) on the Windows Media Player library / database .wmdb format?  (Specifically WMP 12).

The file resides at C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Media Player\CurrentDatabase_[nnn].wmdb. It's a binary file, seemingly uncompressed.

I'm willing to work on this, but don't want to waste my time if it's already been done!

Research:

Specifically, there are a few tools/scripts I've wanted to write that would need to directly manipulate this database.

comments.text: Although they don't have wmdb. I'd like to note that Wotsit.com has a lot of formats.

Hope you are doing well! I am doing a forensic research on Windows Media Player for my Master's Thesis and I am having the same issue, I cannot understand the structure of the "CurrentDatabase_xxx.wmdb" file. If you have figured out about the structure and documented it. Can you please share it with me? It would be a great to me. Thanks in advance.
